name: A Thief's Legacy
description:
Story

Master thief Joshua sets out to steal the valuable medallion of the King, but gets surprised by another thief who snatches the medallion from his grasp. Determined to get the medallion to himself, Joshua hunts down the unknown thief just to find that a third party is also interested in the medallion...

Features

  • 4-5 hours of enchanting gameplay
  • Stunning 720p visuals
  • Full controller support

Vote on Steam Greenlight

We want to bring our game to Steam, and have set up out Greenlight page! If you like A Thief's Legacy, consider dropping us a vote to help us reach our goal!

Should we get our game on Steam, we will be adding Steam Achievements and Steam Trading Cards to the game, and to make the deal even sweeter we'll send a Steam redeemable key free of charge to anyone who buys the game via Itch.io!

Vote for us on Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=792961250

Contact us

If you have any questions or concerns about our game, please send us an email from our homepage at http://startale.online/
